name: restaurant inquiry and reservation
description: Assist user in finding a restaurant and/or making a reservation based on search and reservation constraints.

processes.name: Prompt for search constraints
processes.description: Request user to provide search constraints if not specified.

processes.name: Query restaurant by name
processes.description: Retrieve restaurant details when a specific name is provided.
process: Use Restaurant Query tool with the exact input format 'name: [user-provided name]'

processes.name: Query and recommend restaurants
processes.description: Search and suggest restaurants based on user constraints.
process: Use Restaurant Query tool with the exact input format 'area: [area], price: [price], food: [food]'

processes.name: Restaurant reservation
processes.description: Book the restaurant with provided constraints, handling alternatives.
process: Use restaurant booking system with exact input format 'name: [restaurant name], people: [value], day: [value], time: [value]'
